name: studyplan
description: StudyPlan — Calendario e pianificatore esami per studenti universitari
author: TechnoJaw

scripts.deploy:desktop: VER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && APP=$(ls -d src-tauri/target/release/bundle/macos/*.app 2>/dev/null | head -1) && rm -rf ~/Desktop/StudyPlan.app && ditto "$APP" ~/Desktop/StudyPlan.app && xattr -cr ~/Desktop/StudyPlan.app && codesign --force --deep --sign - ~/Desktop/StudyPlan.app && DIR=~/Desktop/Le\ Mie\ App/StudyPlan && mkdir -p "$DIR" && rm -f "$DIR"/*.dmg 2>/dev/null; for f in src-tauri/target/release/bundle/dmg/*.dmg; do cp "$f" "$DIR/StudyPlan v.${VER}.dmg" 2>/dev/null; done && echo "✅ StudyPlan v$VER → Desktop + Le Mie App"
scripts.deploy:releases: VER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && mkdir -p releases && for f in src-tauri/target/release/bundle/dmg/*.dmg; do cp "$f" releases/StudyPlan\ v.${VER}.dmg 2>/dev/null; done && echo "✅ DMG v$VER → releases/"
scripts.install: npm run build && npm run deploy:desktop
